CustomField.description: Prorate - Will prorate after the required number of years have been met. Standard. Nonprorate - 12 month renewal on the 1st of the month. Annual - Anniversary - 12 month renewal based on anniversary date (not the 1st).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Prorate - Will prorate after the required number of years have been met. Standard. Nonprorate - 12 month renewal on the 1st of the month. Annual - Anniversary - 12 month renewal based on anniversary date (not the 1st).
CustomField.label: Renewal Type
